sqlMap.select: SELECT SEQ_NON_PAY,REQ_DT,APP_REM,APP_DT,EXE_REM,EXE_DT FROM T_NON_PAY WHERE RECODE_ST = 'A' AND SEQ_NON_PAY=#seq#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_NON_PAY.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
